tdXyChart
directive in module tide-angular

Description

Generates a scatered XY Chart

Dependencies

  • _
  • d3
  • tideLayoutXY
  • linearRegression
  • toolTip

Usage

as attribute
<div td-xy-chart
     td-data="{array}"
     td-xattribute="{string}"
     td-yattribute="{string}"
     td-id-attribute="{string}"
     td-size-attribute="{string}"
     td-color-attribute="{string}"
     [td-sqr-scale-x="{boolean}"]
     [td-tooltip-message="{function}"]
     [td-width="{int}"]
     [td-trendline="{boolean}"]
     [td-max-size="{int}"]
     [td-min-size="{int}"]
     [td-color-legend="{array}"]
     [td-selected="{object}"]
     [td-options="{object}"]>
   ...
</div>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
tdDataarray

Data array used for populating the chart

tdXattributestring

Name of the attribute used for the X values in data objects

tdYattributestring

Name of the attribute used for the Y values in data objects

tdIdAttributestring

Name of the attribute used for the ID of unique entities in teh data set

tdSizeAttributestring

Name of the attribute used for defining the size of the bubbles

tdColorAttributestring

Name of the attribute used to define the color categories in the chart

tdSqrScaleX
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if shoudl display x axis using a sqr scale

tdTooltipMessage
(optional)
function

Function that should return a text to be displayed in the tooltip, given a data element

tdWidth
(optional)
int

Chart widht (and height)

tdTrendline
(optional)
boolean

Wether a trendline is displayed in the graph (linear regression)

tdMaxSize
(optional)
int

Maximum size of the bubbles (defaults to 5)

tdMinSize
(optional)
int

Minimun size of the bubbles (defaults to 1)

tdColorLegend
(optional)
array

Array that returns the color codes used in the legend each element is an array ["category", "color"]

tdSelected
(optional)
object

Object with the data element of the selected point in the chart

tdOptions
(optional)
object

Options for chart configuration (i.e. options.margin.left)
